titleInfo.title: Longview of Temple of Amen-Re Precinct Obelisk of Tuthmosis I, left, Obelisk of Hatshepsut, right

mods.abstract: Longview of the Temple of Amen-Re precinct, obelisk of Tuthmosis I (left), obelisk of Hatshepsut (right); Temple of Amen-Re ruins with obelisk of Thutmosis (left) and obelisk of Hatshepsut (right foreground); gateway (background); untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
